Mobster is burnt massively by the fireball. He still was standing.

Mobster=
: I think you are...scared...of me...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  Fro=
m: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, December 29, 2000 =
7:00 AM
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


  Necromancer picks up Razor Claw,=
 "You've seen enough action for today." He transforms back to his dragon fo=
rm to carry the raptor away from the battle only to be struck in the back b=
y mobsters shots. "Looks like the only way out of this is through him." 

 =
 Necromancer flies into the air carrying Razorclaw in one of his claws. He =
launches a white fireball at Mobster, followed by a blue one. the blue catc=
hes up and causes the white one to explode in a brilliance of blinding ligh=
t and searing heat. (Little chemistry note- White and Blue are two of the h=
ottest in the laws of Physics.)
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From:=
 SOULSTICE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Thursday, December 28, 20=
00 7:02 PM
    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


    Mobster is charred some, =
but still doesn't move. He aims at Razorclaw.

    Mobster (multiple voices=
): Doomsday.

    Mobster fires 3 times at Razorclaw...
      ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
  Sent: Tuesday, December 26, 2000 8:36 AM
      Subject: Re: Sorry soulsti=
ce


      The blast hit Razor Claws shield, it saved him from the power of=
 the blast but he'd taxxed it to it's limits. he fell to the ground again s=
pent from the physical exhertion he'd put on himself. He picked himself up =
again insisting on being destroyed on his feet. Fireballs hit Mobster causi=
ng Razor Claw to look back. Necromancer had arrived in time to save him.

 =
     Necromancer saw that he had Mobsters full attention when the giant fir=
ed on him. He transformed to robot mode shrinking down to a smaller target =
to dodge the blast. he rased his rifle and set it on high power. he fired f=
ive blasts at the head of Mobster as he flew down to check the condition of=
 the Raptor he'd just saved.
        ----- Original Message ----- 
        =
From: SOULSTICE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Sent: Monday, Dece=
mber 25, 2000 10:33 PM
        Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


        Mobst=
er fired again at Razorclaw...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
    =
      From: CYBERWOLF4 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: M=
onday, December 25, 2000 4:01 AM
          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


 =
         Razor Claw raised to his feat to stubborn to know when to quit. he=
 stepped forward, ready for anything the larger bot had to offer. "You read=
y to surrender yet?" He asked sarcastically even though he already knew the=
 answer.
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: SOULST=
ICE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Sunday, December=
 24, 2000 9:34 PM
            Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


            Mo=
bster watched, wondering how Razorclaw felt...and enjoying the thought. Mob=
ster, as cruel as the Mini-Mafia could be, waited for Razorclaw to regain h=
is strength and composure, he wanted to knock it out of Razorclaw again...
=
              ----- Original Message ----- 
              From: CYBERWOLF4 =

              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              Sent: Monday, December=
 25, 2000 3:16 AM
              Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


            =
  Razor Claw bounced off Mobster, the impact made his head spin. The mighty=
 raptor heard Mobster have some smart ass comment toward him. He looked up =
in time to see Mobster raise his weapon again. Razor Claw turned and tried =
to run and got just far enough to avoid being hit directly by the beam. The=
 weapon still had a devastating effect on him though as the shrapnel of dir=
t and pebbles shred at his skin. The blast shot him about sixty yards from =
where he'd started. He landed with an ooof as his body skipped multiple tim=
es across the hard African ground. There he lay in pain, trying to regain h=
is strength and composure.
                ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
              From: SOULSTICE 
                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    =
            Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 1:53 PM
                Subject=
: Re: Sorry soulstice


                Mobster wobbled some, but that was =
the extent of it. He turned around.

                Mobster (Grenade voice=
): Are you trying to knock me over, little man?

                Mobster fi=
res at Razorclaw once...
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
                From: CYBERWOLF4 
                  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com =

                  Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 7:54 PM
                =
  Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                  A sudden shadow covered =
Razor Claw as Mobsters foot raised above him. "Oh Pit" he yelled as he turn=
ed to run. His energy was low so he didn't want to risk his shield not hold=
ing. He ran toward Mobster. Mobsters foot struck the ground behind Razor Cl=
aw, the impact shook the ground sending Razor claw rolling past the giant g=
estalt. He rolled to his feat and turned again ready for battle. He dove fo=
rward at Mobsters rear end hoping the giant would still be off balance enou=
gh to knock over.
                    ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
             From: SOULSTICE 
                    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
                   Sent: Sunday, December 24, 2000 10:46 AM
               =
     Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                    (I normally am agai=
nst stomping, but...)
                     
                    Mobster rai=
sed his foot.

                    Mobster (Kracken voice): Over!

        =
            Mobster brung his foot down towards Razorclaw...
              =
        ----- Original Message ----- 
                      From: CYBERWOLF=
4 
                      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                      Sent=
: Sunday, December 24, 2000 12:11 PM
                      Subject: Re: Sor=
ry soulstice


                      Razor Claw remained still as a statue,=
 watching the battle rage around him. He opened a comm to anyone listening.=
 "Razor Claw to any available maximal, I'm pinned down and need some coverf=
ire."
                        ----- Original Message ----- 
               =
         From: SOULSTICE 
                        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
 =
                       Sent: Saturday, December 23, 2000 1:16 PM
          =
              Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                        Mobste=
r stood still. The raptor would have to move sometime.

                   =
     Mobster (Horn Drill voice): He'll have to move sometime. Who helped to=
 build this house?

                        Mobster kept his cannon aimed a=
t Razorclaw, waiting and watching...
                          ----- Origin=
al Message ----- 
                          From: CYBERWOLF4 
             =
             To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                          Sent: Saturd=
ay, December 23, 2000 12:48 PM
                          Subject: Re: Sorry=
 soulstice


                          Razor Claw knew that there was only =
one way to survive a blast from a weapon of that size. he transformed to Ra=
ptor mode and used full strength on his shield. The ground around him incin=
erated on contact. He survived but it was sapping to much of his strength. =
The raptor couldn't move without deactivating his shield.
                 =
           ----- Original Message ----- 
                            From: =
SOULSTICE 
                            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            =
                Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 10:04 AM
                  =
          Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                            Mobste=
r took a scratch of damage, still looking down at Razorclaw. Mobster aimed =
his giant cannon at Razorclaw and fired...
                              --=
--- Original Message ----- 
                              From: CYBERWOLF4 =

                              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                    =
          Sent: Friday, December 22, 2000 7:01 AM
                         =
     Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                              Razor Cla=
w stood confused for the moment, he tried to show no weakness. He stepped f=
orward and hurled his sword at Mobster. "Is this supposed to impress me?" h=
e asked looking up at the bot he challenged. 
                             =
   ----- Original Message ----- 
                                From: SOUL=
STICE 
                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            =
                    Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:50 AM
            =
                    Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                        =
        Gigas didn't move an inch, seeing as how Mobster was in his place n=
ow.

                                Gigas: How about this, I crush you, as=
 Mobster, I crush you, as Gigas, it'll work 2 ways.

                      =
          Mobster switches voices.

                                Kracken=
: But right now, we're Mobster...
                                ----- Ori=
ginal Message ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
    =
                            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                       =
         Sent: Thursday, December 21, 2000 10:15 AM
                       =
         Subject: Re: Sorry soulstice


                                Raz=
or Claw looked up at his attacker still showing no fear, "That sounds like =
a challenge, Let's make this interesting, you knock me down, I join your al=
liance, I knock you down, you surrender to the Maximals, deal?" he stepped =
forward, pulled his left arm back and threw an upprcut into Gigas' stomach.=
 "I'll go first."
                                ----- Original Message --=
--- 
                                From: SOULSTICE 
                     =
           To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                                Sent: We=
dnesday, December 20, 2000 12:18 PM
                                Subject=
: Re: Sorry soulstice


                                Gigas: Oh, hohohoho=
ho, I love an unfair fight. That wasn't my best shot, but I didn't want to =
waste anything on you. In other words, I am not intimidated. I have seen ba=
ttles come and go, me taking the brunt of the attack, but i still stand, I =
still walk, I still fight. You know, you should join the Alliance, it would=
 do you a world of good.

                                Gigas stayed plan=
ted to his spot, not moving an inch...
                                ----=
- Original Message ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 =

                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  =
              Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 10:20 AM
                 =
               Subject: Sorry soulstice


                                S=
orry, it must've been mixxed up in the battle. I found it.

               =
                 claw struck him, but Gigas didn't move. Beholder 2 and Gre=
nade are both bowled over by the energy ball. Horn Drill jumps in the air a=
nd backflips, happy that he again came through for the Mini-Mafia. Gigas lo=
oks down at Razorclaw. (Judging by the size of the Razorclaw figure and the=
 fact that Gigas is a large, Ultra sized bot, like Depth Charge) Gigas swin=
gs a huge punch at Razorclaw

                                Razor Claws h=
ead snapped back from Gigas' punch.  The punch hurt like hell but Razor Cla=
w wouldn't show pain. The impact caused the Raptor to be knocked back about=
 ten feet but he stayed on his feat. He looked back  at the attacker and co=
uldn't hold back a snarl. "I hope that wasn't your best shot, I'd hate to h=
ave to eliminate you in an unfair fight".
                                -=
---- Original Message ----- 
                                From: THECODE =

                                To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                  =
              Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 6:13 PM
                    =
            Subject: Re: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three sh=
ould get help.


                                OOC: Hey, Gigas punched at=
 Razorclaw, post damage...
                                ----- Original M=
essage ----- 
                                From: CYBERWOLF4 
           =
                     To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
                              =
  Sent: Tuesday, December 19, 2000 10:31 AM
                               =
 Subject: three on one hardly seems fair, maybe the three should get help.
=


                                Razor Claw saw the three bots leaving the=
 sceen of the battle and mistook them for escaping alliance members. he men=
tally reported his actions to Ice and got the go ahead. He chased the three=
 until they were out of the way of the fight. He transformed to robot mode,=
 pulled his sword and confronted them. "You will stop or you will be forced=
 to, your choice."

                                He aproached the three =
bots ready for battle and hoping that things won't be ended peacefully.
   =
                             ----- Original Message ----- 
                =
                From: dachande 
                                To: nbwrpg@=
egroups.com 
                                Sent: Monday, December 18, 200=
0 7:40 PM
                                Subject: Eclipse, Wolveritron, an=
d Ramus


                                ::Eclipse/Wolveritron/Ramus::
   =
                              
                                    They had=
 heard the battling and decided to run away, they needed no part in the con=
flict. Eclipse and Wolveritron ran into Ramus as they were leaving, and tog=
ther they exited the base, in beast modes. And headed far away.











=





















          eGroups Sponsor
